entry.value: // Your custom imports:%%00010import org.knime.core.node.NodeLogger;%%00010import gate.Corpus;%%00010import gate.CorpusController;%%00010import gate.Factory;%%00010import gate.FeatureMap;%%00010import gate.Gate;%%00010import gate.termraider.bank.AbstractTermbank;%%00010import gate.termraider.util.Term;%%00010import gate.util.GateException;%%00010import gate.util.persistence.PersistenceManager;%%00010import java.io.File;%%00010import java.io.IOException;%%00010import java.net.URL;%%00010import java.net.URLDecoder;%%00010import java.util.List;%%00010import java.util.ArrayList;%%00010import org.apache.commons.lang.StringEscapeUtils;%%00010

// Your custom variables:%%00010private static CorpusController trApp = null;%%00010private static Corpus corpus = null;%%00010private static final NodeLogger logger = NodeLogger.getLogger(JSnippet.class);%%00010public static void initTermRaider(String gappPath) throws IOException, GateException {%%00010%%00009%%00009// initialise the GATE library%%00010%%00009%%00009logger.error("Initialising GATE...");%%00010%%00009%%00009//Gate.setPluginsHome(new File("/home/zied/knime-workspace/GATE LIB/plugins/"));%%00010%%00009%%00009Gate.init();%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009// Initialize GATE%%00010%%00009%%00009File gateHome = Gate.getGateHome();%%00010%%00009%%00009//Gate.setPluginsHome(new File("/home/zied/GATE_Developer_8.1/plugins"));%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009logger.error("...GATE initialised");%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009// Load TermRaider plugin%%00010%%00009%%00009//File termRaiderPlugin = new File(Gate.getPluginsHome(), "TermRaider");%%00010%%00009%%00009//File gappFile = new File(new File(termRaiderPlugin, "applications"), "termraider-eng.gapp");%%00010%%00009%%00009// CorpusController trApp =%%00010%%00009%%00009// (CorpusController)PersistenceManager.loadObjectFromFile(gappFile);%%00010%%00009%%00009trApp = (CorpusController) PersistenceManager.loadObjectFromFile(new File(gappPath));%%00010%%00009%%00009corpus = (Corpus) Factory.createResource("gate.corpora.CorpusImpl");%%00010%%00009%%00009trApp.init();%%00010%%00009%%00009logger.error("TermRaider loaded successfully!!!");%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00010%%00009public void loadDocumentInCorpus(String path) throws IOException, GateException {%%00010%%00009%%00009corpus.clear();%%00010%%00009%%00009path = URLDecoder.decode(path, "UTF-8");%%00010%%00009%%00009URL u = new File(path).toURL();%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009FeatureMap params = Factory.newFeatureMap();%%00010%%00009%%00009params.put("sourceUrl", u);%%00010%%00009%%00009params.put("preserveOriginalContent", new Boolean(true));%%00010%%00009%%00009params.put("collectRepositioningInfo", new Boolean(true));%%00010%%00009%%00009// Out.prln("Creating doc for " + u);%%00010%%00009%%00009gate.Document doc = (gate.Document) Factory.createResource("gate.corpora.DocumentImpl", params);%%00010%%00009%%00009corpus.add(doc);%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00010%%00009public static void runTermraider() throws GateException {%%00010%%00009%%00009//trApp.init();%%00010%%00009%%00009trApp.setCorpus(corpus);%%00010%%00009%%00009trApp.execute();%%00010%%00009%%00009System.out.println("TermRaider executed successfully!!!");%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00010%%00009public static List<String> getTermraiderResults() throws GateException {%%00010%%00009%%00009List<String> results = new ArrayList<String>();%%00010%%00009%%00009AbstractTermbank tb1 = (AbstractTermbank) Gate.getCreoleRegister()%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009.getLrInstances("gate.termraider.bank.TfIdfTermbank").get(0);%%00010%%00009%%00009AbstractTermbank tb2 = (AbstractTermbank) Gate.getCreoleRegister()%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009.getLrInstances("gate.termraider.bank.AnnotationTermbank").get(0);%%00010%%00009%%00009AbstractTermbank tb3 = (AbstractTermbank) Gate.getCreoleRegister()%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009.getLrInstances("gate.termraider.bank.HyponymyTermbank").get(0);%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009double threshold1 = 0;%%00010%%00009%%00009double threshold2 = 0;%%00010%%00009%%00009double threshold3 = 0;%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009results = getResults(tb1, threshold1);%%00010%%00009%%00009Gate.getCreoleRegister().remove(tb1);%%00010%%00009%%00009Gate.getCreoleRegister().remove(tb2);%%00010%%00009%%00009Gate.getCreoleRegister().remove(tb3);%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009%%00009logger.error("Results done!!!");%%00010%%00009%%00009return results;%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00010%%00009public static List<String> getResults(AbstractTermbank bank, Number threshold) throws GateException {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009List<Term> sortedTerms = bank.getTermsByDescendingScore();%%00010%%00009%%00009List<String> results = new ArrayList<String>();%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009for (Term term : sortedTerms) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009Number score = bank.getDefaultScores().get(term);%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009if (score.doubleValue() >= threshold.doubleValue()) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009logger.error(getRowResult(bank, term));%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009results.add(getRowResult(bank, term));%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009} else { // the rest must be lower%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009break;%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009return results;%%00010%%00010%%00009}%%00010%%00010%%00009/*public static String getRowResult(AbstractTermbank bank, Term term) {%%00010%%00009%%00009StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();%%00010%%00009%%00009sb.append(StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv(term.getTermString()));%%00010%%00009%%00009sb.append(',').append(StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv(term.getLanguageCode()));%%00010%%00009%%00009sb.append(',').append(StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv(term.getType()));%%00010%%00009%%00009for (ScoreType type : bank.getScoreTypes()) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009sb.append(',').append(StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv(bank.getScore(type, term).toString()));%%00010%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009StringBuilder doc = new StringBuilder();%%00010%%00009%%00009for (String document : bank.getDocumentsForTerm(term)) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009document = document.substring(0, document.lastIndexOf(" ["));%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009doc.append(document + ", " + sb.toString());%%00010%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009return sb.toString();%%00010%%00009}*/%%00010%%00010%%00009public static String getRowResult(AbstractTermbank bank, Term term) {%%00010%%00009%%00009StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();%%00010%%00009%%00009sb.append(StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv(term.getTermString()));%%00010%%00009%%00009//sb.append(',').append(StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv(term.getLanguageCode()));%%00010%%00009%%00009sb.append("\t").append(StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv(term.getType()));%%00010%%00009%%00009/*for (ScoreType type : bank.getScoreTypes()) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009sb.append(',').append(StringEscapeUtils.escapeCsv(bank.getScore(type, term).toString()));%%00010%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00009%%00009StringBuilder doc = new StringBuilder();%%00010%%00009%%00009for (String document : bank.getDocumentsForTerm(term)) {%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009document = document.substring(0, document.lastIndexOf(" ["));%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009doc.append(document + ", " + sb.toString());%%00010%%00009%%00009}*/%%00010%%00009%%00009return sb.toString() ;%%00010%%00009}%%00010
